body: the dude who wear the wedding dress got kidnapped from that rich dude because they make a promise: when they grown-up they get married,but sadly they got the wrong dude. they got the dude elder-brother. The one get fucked is the elder brother, the one that actually make the promise is the younger brother, it appear that that rich guy thought the elder brother is that family only child, but actually he got a elder brother.
@MrChuni thx <3 It's sad that even though this doujin was released almost 3 years ago, no one has translated it yet :c
